text: "Kid Charlemagne" is a 1976 song by Steely Dan. It is the leading single from their fifth studio album The Royal Scam. It went to number 82 in the United States and has a bit of funk rhythms and jazz harmonies with rock and roll instrumentals thrown into it. ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:Steely Dan songs Category:Songs about drugs Category:Funk rock songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Jazz rock songs
title: Kid Charlemagne
